item.description:
OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHERE: Sandwich, MA

WHEN: 3:00 p.m.-6:00 p.m.

THE SCENE: Alongside of route 6A, it's a large sweeping, very colorful saltmarsh with a small river running through it. In the distance are trees and some small scenic buildings.

WHERE TO MEET: 3-3:30, Sandwich Coffee center on Jarvis Street.

DIRECTIONS: (from memory) Take route 3S, over the Sagamore bridge and take the exit to historic Sandwich/New Seabury. Take a left off the exit and follow straight about 3 miles into town. Sandwich center is small. You'll pass a pond on your left, a library on your right, and Jarvis street is the 1st or 2nd left thereafter. The coffee-shop is at the far end (1/4 mile) of Jarvis street.

OTHER:
RSVPs: It's best to let us know you are coming so we can look for you or alert you to any changes.
THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, Paper towels, Sweater, water, food
IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.
LAX: You have a half hour of leeway to meet us. After that we may leave without you.
INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.
item.name: OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT: Sandwich, MA
